step1.title: Tell us about you
step1.subtitle: Help us personalize your experience
step1.termsAgreement: By clicking "Continue", you agree to our <termsLink>Terms</termsLink> and have read our <privacyLink>Privacy Policy</privacyLink>.

step2.title: What do you want to use Blawby AI for?
step2.subtitle: This helps us provide more relevant suggestions

askAway.title: Ask away
askAway.description: Blawby AI can answer legal questions, help you understand legal concepts, review documents, and much more.

privacy.title: Don't share sensitive info
privacy.description: Chat history may be reviewed or used to improve our services. Learn more about your choices in our <helpCenterLink>Help Center</helpCenterLink>.

accuracy.title: Check your facts
accuracy.description: While we have safeguards, Blawby AI may give you inaccurate information. It's not intended to give legal advice.

businessDetails.title: Business Details
businessDetails.subtitle: Tell us about your business
businessDetails.businessDescriptionPlaceholder: Share a brief description of your practice.

visibility.title: Make workspace public
visibility.description: When enabled, anyone can chat with your assistant and submit intake questions.

launchFeatures.title: What happens when you launch
launchFeatures.assistantAvailable: Your AI assistant will be available at your intake page URL
launchFeatures.clientsCanChat: Clients can chat with your assistant and submit intake forms
launchFeatures.notifications: You'll receive notifications for new client submissions

lawyer.title: Welcome to Blawby
lawyer.subtitle: Set up your practice to start receiving client intakes

businessWelcome.title: Welcome to Business!
businessWelcome.subtitle: Your practice has been upgraded. Here's what you can do now:

onboarding.title: Your next steps
onboarding.subtitle: Complete onboarding to start receiving client intakes.

consultation.title: Need to speak to a lawyer?
consultation.description: Share a few details and we will connect you with the right attorney for your situation.

error.title: Practice details unavailable
error.description: We could not load the practice name and logo{{slug}}. Please refresh or contact the practice to confirm their public settings.
